text: @RandPaul You can be Christian on Easter Sunday and stay at home and watch church on TV. You’re a disgrace and you’re despicable. I guess putting lives at risk from COVID-19 is fine with you. Reckless endangerment! #WorshipFromHome #PandemicCOVID19 #Resign @RandPaul
